templates.template: <record id="action_${name}_tree" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">${title}</field> <field name="res_model">${model}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${view_id}"/> <field name="context">${context}</field> <field name="search_view_id" ref="${search_view_id}"/> </record>

<record id="action_${name}" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">${title}</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field> <field name="res_model">${model}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="${view_id}"/> <field name="multi">True</field> <field name="target">new</field> </record>

<record id="irconfig_${name}" model="ir.values"> <field name="model_id" ref="${model_id}" /> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="object" eval="1" /> <field name="name">${title}</field> <field name="key2">client_action_multi</field> <field name="value" eval="'ir.actions.act_window,' + str(ref('${action_id}'))" /> <field name="key">action</field> </record>

<act_window id="action_${name}" multi="True" key2="client_action_multi" name="${title}" res_model="${wizard_model}" src_model="${model}" view_mode="form" target="new" view_type="form" view_id="wizard_${name}"/>
<record model="ir.module.category" id="module_category_${category}"> <field name="name">${name}</field> <field name="visible" eval="0" /> </record>
<openerp> <data> ${cursor} </data> </openerp>

<record id="group_${group}" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">${name}</field> <field name="category_id" ref="${category_id}"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> </record>

<record id="${type}_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.${type}_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${modul}.${super_form_id}"/> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> ${cursor} </field> </record>

<openerp> <data> <record id="board_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.board_${name}</field> <field name="model">board.board</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${modul}.${super_form_id}"/> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> ${cursor} </field> </record> </data> </openerp>

<openerp> <data> <record id="form_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.form_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${base_modul}.${super_form_id}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> ${cursor} </field> </record> </data> </openerp>

<openerp> <data> <record id="tree_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.tree_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${modul}.${super_form_id}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> ${cursor} </field> </record> </data> </openerp>

<record id="${name}" model="ir.property"> <field name="name">${name}</field> <field name="fields_id" search="[('model','=','${owner_model}'),('name','=','${name}')]"/> <field name="value" eval="'${value_model},'+str(list0)"/> </record>
<record id="${name}" model="${model}"> <field name="name">${description}</field> ${cursor} </record>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <openerp> <data> <report id="report_${name}_pdf" override_id="sale.report_${name}" string="${title}" name="${name}" auto="False" report_type="aeroo" model="${model}" in_format="oo-odt" out_format="oo-pdf" parser="${addon}/${parser}.py" rml="${addon}/${template}.odt"/> </data> </openerp>

<record id="access_${model}_all" model="ir.model.access"> <field name="name">${model}/all</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_${model}"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${read}"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${delete}"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="${create}"/> <field name="perm_write" eval="${write}"/> </record>

<record id="access_${model}_${group}" model="ir.model.access"> <field name="name">${model}/${group}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="${modul}.model_${model}"/> <field name="group_id" ref="${modul}.group_${group}"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${read}"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${delete}"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="${create}"/> <field name="perm_write" eval="${write}"/> </record>

<record id="access_${model}_${group}" model="ir.model.access"> <field name="name">${model}/${group}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_${model}"/> <field name="group_id" ref="group_${group}"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${read}"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${delete}"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="${create}"/> <field name="perm_write" eval="${write}"/> </record>

<record id="access_${model}_${group}" model="ir.model.access"> <field name="name">${model}/${group}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_${model}"/> <field name="group_id" ref="${modul}.group_${group}"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${read}"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${delete}"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="${create}"/> <field name="perm_write" eval="${write}"/> </record>

<record id="rule_${model}_${name}" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name">${model}/${name}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_${model}"/> <field name="domain_force">${domain}</field> <field name="groups" eval="[(4,ref('${group}'))]"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${read}"/> <field name="perm_write" eval="${write}"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="${create}"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${unlink}"/> </record>

<record id="search_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <record id="search_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.search_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="Search ${one}"> <!--field name="name" filter_domain="['|', ('name','ilike',self), ('otherfield','ilike',self)]" string="${one}"/ --> <!--filter string="Some State" domain="[('state','=','draft')]" icon="terp-camera_test"/ --> <!--field name="state"/ --> <!-- <group expand="0" string="Group By..."> <filter string="Status" context="{'group_by': 'state'}" icon="terp-stock_effects-object-colorize"/> </group> --> </search> </field> </record> </record>

<record id="form_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.form_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${one}" version="7.0"> ${cursor} </form> </field> </record>

template.description: OpenERP: Simple Form and Tree Definition
template.name: o_viewtree_simple

templates.template:
${modul}.form_${name} ${model}
${cursor}
${modul}.tree_${name} ${model} ${modul}.search_${name} ${model} ${one} ${model} form tree,form

<openerp> <data>
<record id="wizard_${name}" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${modul}.wizard_${name}</field> <field name="model">${model}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Transport Wizard" version="7.0"> <group> <group> <field name="${cursor}"/> </group> </group> <footer> <button icon="gtk-go-forward" name="do_${method}" string="${string}" type="object" class="oe_highlight" /> or <button special="cancel" string="Close" class="oe_link" /> </footer> </form> </field> </record>
</data> </openerp>
<data> <xpath expr="/${treeform}/${element}[@${field}='${value}']" position="${position}"> ${cursor} </xpath> </data>
